description: Rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony (involving conversion of roofspace to habitable use) and installation of three roflights to front roofslope, following the raising of the ridgeheight.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: Drawings: Site and Location Plan, Block Plan, DWG PP-01 (Existing Ground Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-02 (Exisitng First Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-03 (Existing Loft Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-04 (Existing Roof Top Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-05 (Existing Elevations and Sections) dated 15-06-16, PP-06 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-07 (Proposed First Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-08 (Proposed Loft Floor Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-09 (Proposed Roof Top Plan) dated 15-06-16, PP-10 (Proposed Elevations and Sections) dated 15-06-16, PP-11 (Existing and Proposed East Elevation) dated 15-06-16, PP-12 (Existing and Proposed Block Plans) dated 15-06-16

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall be those as listed on the plans as approved in Condition (2) and within the Section 11 of the submitted application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the Consolidated London Plan (2015) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
